hero.title: India's Digital Mandi
hero.subtitle: Transparent, fair and real-time marketplace connecting farmers, traders, buyers and mandi authorities on one digital platform.

why.title: Why CiberMandi
why.body: CiberMandi is a public digital mandi ecosystem designed to modernize agricultural trading. It digitizes the entire mandi workflow—from farmer arrival to auction, payment, and dispatch. It ensures transparency, fairness, and efficiency for all stakeholders.

farmers.title: Benefits for Farmers
points: Transparent digital auctions with fair price discovery.
Real-time mandi rates and trends.
Fast, secure UPI/bank payments.
Digital receipts for weight, auction, payment, and dispatch.
Option to sell directly to buyers in the marketplace.
Weather alerts, soil insights, crop advisory.
Multi-language interface with reduced waiting times.

traders.title: Benefits for Traders
points: Access to more farmers and incoming lots.
Participate in fair auctions with no manual interference.
Faster checkout via automated weight capture.
Digital ledger for balances, dues, and settlements.
Accurate records and analytics for planning.

mandiBoards.title: Benefits for Mandi Boards / Authorities
points: Fully digital and transparent mandi operations.
Real-time monitoring of arrivals, auctions, prices, and users.
Reduction in revenue leakage; improved fee collection.
Automated weighbridge integration.
Daily/monthly reports and commodity analytics.
Higher farmer satisfaction and trust.

howItWorks.title: How CiberMandi Works
steps: Live auction begins, traders bid digitally.
Winning bid locked, auction slip generated.

marketplace.title: Marketplace for Farmers
points: Farmers list produce directly for buyers.
Verified buyers and logistics support.
Direct payments, digital negotiation.

security.title: Security & Trust
points: Encrypted transactions.
Verified farmers/traders.
Transparent audit logs.
Govt-compliant workflows.
